column1: How do I Make a regular Table Booking?
column2: select your Date and Time required and your booking is instantly confirmed the minute you hit "Book"

column1: How can I be certain my booking's been received?
column2: We'll send an instant confirmation email to the address used in your booking.

column1: How do I cancel a booking?
column2: If you need to cancel less than 24 hours before your dinner date you can use the cancellation link within your reminder email

column1: How do I Claim a Free Coupon?
column2: To redeem - simply present coupon to staff when paying.
